Package chessgame

Class ChessView

java.lang.Object
chessgame.ChessView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject
public class ChessView extends Object implements Subject
The ChessView class; Implements Subject class. This class is part of the MVC design pattern, and it acts as a view in the MVC relationship. The ChessView presents relevant game data of the ChessGame in the ChessGameContainer, such as the chess pieces on the chess board, the current player turn, and the last moved piece. It is called by the ChessController.

Additionally, this class is part of the Observer design pattern, and it acts as an Subject. When being referenced to the ChessController, the ChessView adds the former as an Observer and notifies Event to it for subsequence actions.

See Also:

  • ChessController

    • updateSwitchButton

      public void updateSwitchButton(boolean enabled)
      Update the switch button in the referenced ChessGameContainer to the specified enabled state. If the enabled state is true, the switch button will be enabled - setEnabled(true). Otherwise if the enabled state is false, the switch button will be disabled - setEnabled(false).
      Parameters:
      enabled - the enabled state to update the switch button to

    • getPieceImage

      public Image getPieceImage(Piece piece)
      Returns the Image that represents the specified Piece object. This method calls PieceImageType.getImage to retrieve the Image of a PieceImageType that corresponds to the PieceType of the chess piece.
      Parameters:
      piece - the Piece object
      Returns:
      the Image of the piece
      See Also:
      • ChessView.PieceImageType
      • ChessView.PieceImageType.getImage(Color)
      • Piece.PieceType

    • notifyPieceSwitch

      public void notifyPieceSwitch()
      Displays a message dialog in the referenced ChessGameContainer to notify the piece switch event between Time and Plus pieces.

    • promptNewGameConfirmation

      public boolean promptNewGameConfirmation(int winnerIndex)
      Prompts a new game confirmation in the referenced ChessGameContainer. This method is called after a Player has won the game, and it declares the winner in the prompt. If user selects "Yes" and confirms a new game, notifies the Observer object(s) of Event.NEWGAME and returns true. Otherwise if user selects "No", exits the application.
      Parameters:
      winnerIndex - the index of winner Player
      Returns:
      true if user selects "Yes" and confirms a new game

    • addPieceIconResizer

      public void addPieceIconResizer(ChessBoard board)
      Removes existing ComponentListener of the referenced ChessGameContainer and attach a new ComponentAdapter to the container that resizes the piece Icon in the container whenever the component is resized. This method calls updateGridSize, and updatePieceIcons to resize piece Icon.
      Parameters:
      board - the ChessBoard object as reference
      See Also:
      • updateGridSize()
      • updatePieceIcons(ChessBoard)

    • loadPieceIcons
